title: chromas packs
body:
I'm having issue to find my chroma packs since new update patched.  cant choice them in champ select or summoner profile.
Does anyone else having that problem at moment？
Should i reinstall lol？ or because riot disabled them for some reason？？

replies.body:
Hey Trouble Maker K,

They got bugged or overlooked with the update and will be reinstated in a future patch.

-DTN
